H0.text: Direction is a change in the position of an object as time changes.

H1.text: Waves best describe a change in the position of an object as time changes.

H2.text: Motion is a change in the position of an object as time changes.

H3.text: Frequency is a change in the position of an object as time changes.

A4.text: In physics, motion is when an object changes its position with respect to a reference point in a given time.
